title: Riot, stop screwing around, TWO FACTOR AUTHENTICATION
body: Seriously, I see so many posts about people getting their accounts hacked. Literally all you have to do is throw two-factor authentication in there with a phone app.

replies.body:
Actually, according to our [*Security Page*](http://www.riotgames.com/riot-games-security), this feature is "coming soon". I'm quite a security-centric individual (love lastpass, keepass, VPN's, etc), so I'm quite excited that we're looking into 2FA for the future.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

This is awesome to hear. Being in college for Cyber Security, I have two factor authentication on every account I have, including emails.

It seems the majority of the public doesn't though, or has the mindset of "it wont happen to me". In the world of technology, security by force is usually the way to go.
This is something I feel like should be a thing with the LCU, I don't think the Adobe AIR client can handle 2FA without killing itself in the process. XD
